transcript: when you're zooming all the way out of a business there's many things you can sell you can sell Services you can sell physical products you can sell money and so you have to figure out do I want to do it with information do I want to do it with a service do I want to do a physical product that I'm going to send them that demonstrates it and the question is which of these is going to be perceived as the highest value from the Prospect and increase the likelihood that they ultimately buy from you the most
